subtitle: the year is 1847 a young archaeologist named Austen Henry Layard was Indiana
jonesing his way around ancient Mesopotamian ruins where he properly
identified and henceforth discovered the ancient Assyrian city-state of Nineveh
in an area now known as Iraq in an absolutely incredible discovery he found
22,000 clay tablets hidden in the depths of the city these tablets contained
cuneiform which today is one of if not the earliest known writing systems known
to men created by the Sumerians 6,000 years ago over the years more ancient
historical cities were found and excavated many of the world's museums
now count among their prized exhibits the ceremonial gates winged Bulls
chariots tools utensils jewelry statues and other objects that have been dug out
of the mounds that are Assyria and Babylon but the true treasures of these
kingdoms were their written records
the cuneiform tablets of Sumer contained inscriptions of a tremendous magnitude
encompassing cosmological tales epic poems histories of kings temple records
and not least of all texts dealing with the names genealogies epithets deeds
powers and duties of the gods known as the Anunnaki
today there are several main interpretations about what the term gods
actually meant to these ancient people the most socially acceptable
interpretation today is generally that these gods represent forces of nature or
aspects of life there are also specific times when the Sumerians make reference
to planets or star constellations who are also referred to as gods one of the
most controversial theories today is that these gods were actual beings like
us who played a part in the creation of humanity the tablets describe how the
gods created our species and explained the purpose behind our existence
this story was filtered throughout the epochs of mankind and eventually became
an altered version and the most well known creation story on our planet to
date but the question is what does this story truly mean and how does it impact
us today is there any validity to the ideas of the Anunnaki and the planet
Nibiru let's find out
hey everyone thank you so much for all of your love support and patience while
we've been working on this project the new human history series is massive and
it's taking a lot longer to produce than we had originally planned but don't
worry it's going to be well worth the wait if you want to help us finish
putting the series together you can support our studio by heading over to
the spirit shop we've got crystal infused spirit shirts
for the route sacral and the solar plexus chakra the new edition of patch
tarot is also available along with the physically printed book of patch the
ultimate guide to patch tarot and the ancient Kabbalistic mysteries with all
of that said we've got some epic things coming your way so stay tuned and have a
very happy new year
